### What to know to be a Frontend Developer

#### Javascript

- ES6+
  - let & const
  - closures
  - classes
    - prototypal inheritance
  - promises
  - async & await
  - fetch API
  - arrow functions
  - modules (import/export)
  - template string
  - spread operator
- version control
- npm/yarn
  - semantic versioning
  - npm scripts
- linux
- webpack
- one JS framework (react)

#### CSS

- display property
- position property
- z-index
- flex box / css grids

#### Other

- svg/canvas
- task runner (grunt/gulp)
- service workers
- test framework (jest)
- mobile dev
